sqlMap.select: SELECT user_id as userId,username as userName FROM tbl_user WHERE username = #username# AND password = #password# AND status = 1;
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_todolist (user_id, task, description, exp_startdttm, exp_enddttm, actual_startdttm, actual_enddttm, priority, complete_perc, status, deviation_dttm, deviation_reason) VALUES (#userId#, #taskName#, #taskDesc#, null #expStartDttm#, null #expEndDttm#, null #actStartDttm#, null #actEndDttm#, #priority#, #completePer#, #statusCode#, null #devDttm#, #devReason#);
sqlMap.select: SELECT task_id, task, date_format( exp_startdttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS exp_startdttm, date_format( exp_enddttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) as exp_enddttm, (SELECT tbl_status.status_value FROM tbl_status WHERE tbl_todolist.status = status_id ) AS status, complete_perc, priority, is_deviated FROM tbl_todolist order by task_id;

SELECT task_id, user_id, task, description, date_format( exp_startdttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS exp_startdttm, date_format( exp_enddttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) as exp_enddttm, date_format( actual_startdttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) as actual_startdttm, date_format( actual_enddttm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) as actual_enddttm, priority, complete_perc, STATUS ,stat_comment, is_deviated, deviation_dttm, deviation_reason FROM tbl_todolist WHERE task_Id =#value#;
sqlMap.update: update tbl_todolist set task = #taskName#, description = #taskDesc#, exp_startdttm = null #expStartDttm#, exp_enddttm = null #expEndDttm#, actual_startdttm = null #actStartDttm#, actual_enddttm = null #actEndDttm#, priority = #priority#, complete_perc = #completePer#, status = #statusCode#, stat_comment = #statComment#, deviation_dttm = null #devDttm#, deviation_reason = #devReason# where task_id = #taskId#;
sqlMap.select: SELECT task_id, task, date_format( exp_startdttm, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i' ) AS exp_startdttm, date_format( exp_enddttm, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i' ) as exp_enddttm, (SELECT tbl_status.status_value FROM tbl_status WHERE tbl_todolist.status = status_id ) AS status, complete_perc, priority, is_deviated FROM tbl_todolist where curdate() BETWEEN date_format(exp_startdttm, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(exp_enddttm, '%Y-%m-%d') and user_id = #value# and status <> '4' and complete_perc < 100 order by task_id;

SELECT task_id, task, date_format( exp_startdttm, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i' ) AS exp_startdttm, date_format( exp_enddttm, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i' ) as exp_enddttm, (SELECT tbl_status.status_value FROM tbl_status WHERE tbl_todolist.status = status_id ) AS status, complete_perc, priority, 1 as is_deviated FROM tbl_todolist where date_format(exp_enddttm,'%Y-%m-%d') < curdate() and actual_enddttm is null and user_id = #value# and status <> '4' and complete_perc < 100 order by task_id;
